name: IWSC 2017 submission: Using compilation & decompilation to enhance clone detection
tagline: A website accompanying the IWSC 2017 paper "Using compilation/decompilation to enhance clone detection".
body:
### Clone Oracle
The 326 clone pairs manually validated can be downloaded [here](clone_oracle.csv).

### Clone Mapper
The source code of clone mapper tool can be downloaded [here](clone_mapper_src.zip).

### Systems
The three selected systems for our study (junit4, jfreechart, tomcat) can be downloaded below:
* [junit4](systems/junit.zip)
* [jfreechart](systems/jfreechart.zip)
* [tomcat](systems/tomcat.zip)

### Contact
Please contact Chaiyong Ragkhitwetsagul (ucabagk at ucl dot ac dot uk) for any inquiries regarding this project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
